mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction(tranNo, userId, prodNo, divyAddress, pickupAddress, startDate, endDate, period, paymentNo, paymentDate, paymentWay, receiverPhone, receiverName, prodName, prodImg, originPrice, discountPrice, resultPrice) values (#{tranNo}, #{userId}, #{prodNo}, #{divyAddress}, #{pickupAddress}, date_add(curdate(), interval 1 day), date_add(curdate(), interval 1+#{period} day), #{period}, #{paymentNo}, current_timestamp(), #{paymentWay}, #{receiverPhone}, #{receiverName}, #{prodName}, #{prodImg}, #{originPrice}, #{discountPrice}, #{resultPrice})
mapper.select:
SELECT t.prodNo, t.tranNo, t.userId, t.prodName, t.startDate, t.endDate, t.paymentDate, t.resultPrice, p.recentImg, p.prodCondition FROM product p, transaction t
p.prodNo = t.prodNo
and p.prodCondition = '물품보관승인신청중'
and p.prodCondition = #{searchProductCondition}
and (p.prodCondition = #{searchProductCondition}) and (t.#{searchCondition} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))
ORDER BY t.tranNo ASC
ORDER BY t.tranNo DESC
ORDER BY t.startDate ASC
ORDER BY t.startDate DESC
